name: Daddy's Anger
description:
┎┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┒

Daddy will get home very soon, he is not happy with your behavior... 

can you avoid a violent night?

┖┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┚

▛▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝▝ ▜

You are an 8 year old boy who just wants peace, you don't know why but daddy is very upset with you, and he always is. 

He is an awful human full of hatred and you know it.

Are you tired? You want him to stop hurting you, but what can a child do about abuse?

Go around the house gathering useful items to see if you can stop the violence in this Point-and-Click puzzle game. 

When you feel like you've done everything you can, click the left upper corner to end the day and see your decisions unfold.

Will you be able to stop daddy?

▙ ▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▖▟
